original: @148b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @148b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ma h'a ts'i na kra ma t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ma h'a ts'i na kra ma t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
translated: Mahācīnakramatārāsādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rgya nag chen po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rgya nag chen po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Sādhana of Tārā in the System of Great China

original: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Lady Tārā!

original: g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis ro yi snying gar mnan cing mi bzad mchog gi gad rgyangs dgod //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis ro yi snying gar mnan cing mi bzad mchog gi gad rgyangs dgod //
translated: With her left leg extended, she presses on the heart of a corpse, laughing a terrifying, supreme laugh.

original: ral gri autpal gri gug thod pa phyag bsnams h'um yig sa bon las byung ma //
analyzed: ral gri autpal gri gug thod pa phyag bsnams h'um yig sa bon las byung ma //
translated: She holds a sword, utpala, flaying knife, and skull-cup, arisen from the seed syllable hūṃ.

original: thung zhing sngo la sbom pa ral pa'i thor tshugs ser po mchog gi klu dang ldan //
analyzed: thung zhing sngo la sbom pa ral pa'i thor tshugs ser po mchog gi klu dang ldan //
translated: Short, blue, and stout, with a topknot of yellow hair, adorned with the supreme nāga.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi mi shes thod pa la bkod 'joms shing drag po'i sgrol ma nyid //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi mi shes thod pa la bkod 'joms shing drag po'i sgrol ma nyid //
translated: She destroys the skull of the ignorance of beings and is the fierce Tārā herself.

original: sgrol ma srid pa gsum sgrol ma //
analyzed: sgrol ma srid pa gsum sgrol ma //
translated: Tārā, deliverer from the three worlds!

original: rgya nag rim 'ongs la btud de //
analyzed: rgya nag rim 'ongs la btud de //
translated: I bow to the lineage that came from China🔽and will explain her sādhana

original: bla ma'i man ngag ji lta bar //🔽de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag ji lta bar //🔽de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod //
translated: just as it is in the guru's instructions.

original: ling+ga gcig dang dur khrod dang // yang na khyim ni stong pa ru //
analyzed: ling+ga gcig dang dur khrod dang // yang na khyim ni stong pa ru //
translated: In a single liṅga, or in a charnel ground, or else in an empty house,

original: thams cad du ni der gnas nas //
analyzed: thams cad du ni der gnas nas //
translated: there, abiding everywhere,🔽the yogin of knowledge should practice

original: srid pa gsum las sgrol ba yi //🔽rig pa rnal 'byor ba yis bsgrub //🔽stan 'jam @149a * //
analyzed: srid pa gsum las sgrol ba yi // rig pa rnal 'byor ba yis bsgrub // stan 'jam @149a * //
translated: the liberation from the three worlds.🔽He should sit on a soft seat

original: nang tshangs can la gnas //🔽gzhan yang 'jam por gyur pa yi //
analyzed: nang tshangs can la gnas // gzhan yang 'jam por gyur pa yi //
translated: covered with cotton,🔽or else on a wooden seat,

original: shing stan la sogs mnyam gnas la //
analyzed: shing stan la sogs mnyam gnas la //
translated: and so forth, on an even surface.

original: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //🔽skad cig rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya // skad cig rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: He should practice for the supreme attainment.🔽Well equipoised from the three vajras,

original: rdo rje gsum las legs mnyam gzhag / gnas gsum du ni de bsam bya //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum las legs mnyam gzhag / gnas gsum du ni de bsam bya //
translated: he should visualize that in the three places,

original: de las 'od zer rnam 'phros nas //
analyzed: de las 'od zer rnam 'phros nas //
translated: and light rays emanate from that,

original: srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: illuminating the sentient beings who experience the three worlds.

original: gsal bar mdzad nas slar yang ni //
analyzed: gsal bar mdzad nas slar yang ni //
translated: Having illuminated them, they again

original: bsdus nas khams gsum mtha' dag kyang //
analyzed: bsdus nas khams gsum mtha' dag kyang //
translated: gather back in and he should visualize the entire three worlds

original: stong pa nyid du bsam par bya //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du bsam par bya //
translated: as emptiness.

original: de nas rgyal ba'i gsang sngags brjod //
analyzed: de nas rgyal ba'i gsang sngags brjod //
translated: Then he should recite the secret mantra of the Victor:

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a sogs rang bzhin no //
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a sogs rang bzhin no //
translated: “Oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ.”

original: de nas nam mkha' a'a:yig las ;
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' a'a:yig las ;
translated: Then from the space of the letter āḥ,

original: / chu skyes dmar po bsam par bya //
analyzed: / chu skyes dmar po bsam par bya //
translated: One should visualize a red lotus.

original: slar yang de steng bsam bya ba //
analyzed: slar yang de steng bsam bya ba //
translated: Again, above that one should visualize

original: t'am yig las ni padma'i snod //
analyzed: t'am yig las ni padma'i snod //
translated: A vessel of lotus from the syllable tāṃ.

original: slar yang de dbus bsam par bya //
analyzed: slar yang de dbus bsam par bya //
translated: Again, in its center one should visualize

original: h'um yig mthon mthing dang mtshungs pa //
analyzed: h'um yig mthon mthing dang mtshungs pa //
translated: The syllable hūṃ, which is the color of sapphire.

original: de las h'um yig las skyes pa'i //
analyzed: de las h'um yig las skyes pa'i //
translated: From that, from the syllable hūṃ,

original: gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan blta //
analyzed: gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan blta //
translated: One should see a flaying knife, which is marked with the seed syllable.

original: gri gug yongs su gyur pa las //
analyzed: gri gug yongs su gyur pa las //
translated: From the transformation of the flaying knife,

original: bdag nyid sgrol ma dang mtshungs bsgom //
analyzed: bdag nyid sgrol ma dang mtshungs bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on oneself as Tārā.

original: zhabs ni g-yon brkyang mi bzad ma //
analyzed: zhabs ni g-yon brkyang mi bzad ma //
translated: One’s left leg is extended, and one is fierce.

original: mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang //
analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang //
translated: One wears a garland of heads.

original: thung zhing lto 'phyang 'jigs byed ma //
analyzed: thung zhing lto 'phyang 'jigs byed ma //
translated: One is short, with a protruding belly, and terrifying.

original: chu skyes sngon pos rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: chu skyes sngon pos rnam par brgyan //
translated: One is adorned with a blue lotus.

original: bzang mo zhal gcig spyan gsum ma //
analyzed: bzang mo zhal gcig spyan gsum ma //
translated: The good one has one face and three eyes.

original: mi bzad gad rgyangs 'od dang ldan //
analyzed: mi bzad gad rgyangs 'od dang ldan //
translated: One has a terrifying laugh and is radiant.

original: rab tu dgyes shing ro la zhon ;
analyzed: rab tu dgyes shing ro la zhon ;
translated: One is very pleased and rides on a corpse.

original: / klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: / klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
translated: One is adorned with the eight nāgas.

original: spyan ni dmar zhing zlum pa ste //
analyzed: spyan ni dmar zhing zlum pa ste //
translated: One’s eyes are red and round.

original: stag gi pags pa rked la mnabs //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa rked la mnabs //
translated: One wears a tiger skin around one’s waist.

original: lang tsho gzhon zhing phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: lang tsho gzhon zhing phun sum tshogs //
translated: Youthful, perfect,

original: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: ljags ni bsgril zhing mche ba gtsigs //
analyzed: ljags ni bsgril zhing mche ba gtsigs //
translated: tongue rolled, fangs bared,

original: 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa mo //🔽phyag g-yas ral gri gri gug ste //
analyzed: 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa mo // phyag g-yas ral gri gri gug ste //
translated: terrifying, greatly terrifying,🔽right hand a sword and flaying knife,

original: g-yon na autpal thod pa bsnams //
analyzed: g-yon na autpal thod pa bsnams //
translated: left an utpala and skull-cup,

original: dmar ser ral gcig gyen du brdzes //
analyzed: dmar ser ral gcig gyen du brdzes //
translated: red-orange, one-haired, hair bristling upward,

original: mi bskyod dbu brgyan bsam par bya //
analyzed: mi bskyod dbu brgyan bsam par bya //
translated: Akṣobhya crown ornament, one should imagine.

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa yis //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa yis //
translated: By perfecting the power of meditation,

original: rnal 'byor snyan ngag chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor snyan ngag chen por 'gyur //
translated: one becomes a great yogin poet.

original: gal te blun zhing rmongs gyur kyang //
analyzed: gal te blun zhing rmongs gyur kyang //
translated: Even if one is foolish and ignorant,

original: bsgom pa'i ro la brtson phyed na //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i ro la brtson phyed na //
translated: if one strives in the taste of meditation,

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain Mañjughoṣa himself.

original: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas par bya //
analyzed: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas par bya //
translated: One should recite one hundred thousand times

original: ye ge gsum gyi sngags chen po //
analyzed: ye ge gsum gyi sngags chen po //
translated: the great mantra of the three syllables,

original: phat yig mtha' ru snying gar dgod //
analyzed: phat yig mtha' ru snying gar dgod //
translated: with the syllable phaṭ at the end, placed in the heart,

original: 'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan //
translated: endowed with the five lights,

original: ma shes bud shing bsreg pa po //
analyzed: ma shes bud shing bsreg pa po //
translated: the burner of the firewood of ignorance.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the followers of Yogācāra,

original: de yis btu ba'i cho ga @149b brjod ;
analyzed: de yis btu ba'i cho ga @149b brjod ;
translated: The procedure for extracting it is stated.

original: / dang po sa yi pha rol phyin //
analyzed: / dang po sa yi pha rol phyin //
translated: First, the perfection of the earth,

original: dbyangs yig bzhi pas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bzhi pas rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with the fourth vowel [u],

original: ra yig la zhon 'od zer 'phro //
analyzed: ra yig la zhon 'od zer 'phro //
translated: mounted on the letter ra, radiating light,

original: zla ba thig le yang dag ldan //
analyzed: zla ba thig le yang dag ldan //
translated: endowed with the drop of the moon,

original: de ni yig la yang sbyin //
analyzed: de ni yig la yang sbyin //
translated: and then the letter ya is given.

original: de bzhin bzhi pas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: de bzhin bzhi pas rnam par brgyan //
translated: Likewise, it is adorned with the fourth [u],

original: slar yang ha yig la sbyor te //
analyzed: slar yang ha yig la sbyor te //
translated: and again it is joined with the letter ha,

original: au yig ring po yang dag ldan //
analyzed: au yig ring po yang dag ldan //
translated: endowed with the long vowel [au],

original: phat kyi yi ge'ang de nas sbyin //
analyzed: phat kyi yi ge'ang de nas sbyin //
translated: and then the letter phaṭ is given.

original: yongs rdzogs grub pa'i sngags nyid do //🔽mkhas pas ral gri'i gnas su ni //
analyzed: yongs rdzogs grub pa'i sngags nyid do // mkhas pas ral gri'i gnas su ni //
translated: This is the complete mantra.🔽The wise one should imagine🔽a garland of human bone

original: mi yi rus pa'i phreng ba bsam//
analyzed: mi yi rus pa'i phreng ba bsam//
translated: in the place of the sword.

original: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the process of emanating and reabsorbing,

original: sngags mchog yang dag bzlas par bya //
analyzed: sngags mchog yang dag bzlas par bya //
translated: one should recite the supreme mantra.

original: brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag byas na //
analyzed: brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag byas na //
translated: Having examined with a stable mind,

original: bdag nyid mkhas shing snyan ngag che //
analyzed: bdag nyid mkhas shing snyan ngag che //
translated: one is skilled and has great poetry.

original: rtag tu bsgom pa goms pa yis //
analyzed: rtag tu bsgom pa goms pa yis //
translated: By always cultivating meditation,

original: de nyid the tshom med par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid the tshom med par 'gyur //
translated: one will certainly attain reality.

original: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brtsams pa las //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brtsams pa las //
translated: From the composition of the Tārā Sādhana,

original: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
analyzed: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
translated: By whatever virtue I have accumulated,

original: de yis srog chags thams cad ni //
analyzed: de yis srog chags thams cad ni //
translated: may all living beings

original: rgyal ba'i bstan la mkhas par shog / de 'dir rtag pa'i rdo rje yis //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bstan la mkhas par shog / de 'dir rtag pa'i rdo rje yis //
translated: become learned in the teachings of the Victorious One.

original: blo 'phel sgrub thabs byas pa yis ;
analyzed: blo 'phel sgrub thabs byas pa yis ;
translated: By this composition of the means of accomplishment of increasing intelligence,

original: / zab mo la ni mkhas pa rnams //
analyzed: / zab mo la ni mkhas pa rnams //
translated: may those who are learned in the profound

original: 'di la bzod pa mdzad par rigs //
analyzed: 'di la bzod pa mdzad par rigs //
translated: be pleased with this.

original: rgya nag chen po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rgya nag chen po'i rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The means of accomplishment of Tārā according to the tradition of Great China, composed by the master Rāhula, is complete.
